snippet: An array of film-related and other artifacts assembled by Chad Dreier, the longtime executive of the home-building company Ryland Group, and his son Doug, will be auctioned in Los Angeles beginning on July 28.
abstract: An array of film-related and other artifacts assembled by Chad Dreier, the longtime executive of the home-building company Ryland Group, and his son Doug, will be auctioned in Los Angeles beginning on July 28.
